model_answer: The video shows a man kneeling beside a silver SUV changing a tire while the narrator explains they got a flat, had to use a donut spare (calling it sketchy at high speeds), drove to a Discount Tire, and then got a new tire for free around the 00:05:08 mark, so the correct answer would be option C.

The answer is A: [00:03:05 - 00:03:25]. In this segment of the audio, the hiker is described as standing in a sunny pine forest, holding a selfie stick and a plastic bag while enthusiastically thanking Dale for gifting him an "end-fed random wire" antenna built off K6ARK plans. The description also notes that these antennas are hard to build.
